text: With listless officials loafing around, the state stagnates.
Slacking hands lead to lacking contributions.
Well managed offices are set to secure resources for the needs of the state.
Everything must run at a strict schedule, from gathering harvests to the operation of markets.
Let no effort shirk, let no man act without purpose.
[[b]]Supervision[[/b]] can be increased by assignments, non-aggression pacts, and military access.
[[b]]Supervision[[/b]] can be decreased by armies on field, court positions, and assignments.
With careful management, every small effort can contribute to a greater whole. At times of peace, soldiers are better used put to public works than standing around idle.
• Armies boost Income in cities while consuming Supervision & reducing morale by 1
• Governor boost Income in cities while consuming Supervision & reducing trade income
With careful management, every small effort can contribute to a greater whole. At times of peace, soldiers are better used put to public works than standing around idle.
With careful management, every small effort can contribute to a greater whole. At times of peace, soldiers are better used put to public works than standing around idle.
Supervisors, managers and investigators must be hired, their offices staffed and provided for. Your aide will procure what is needed, and recruit those worthy.
Your attendant will perform a subtle, yet thorough inspection of all military and civil offices. Should any man prove to be idle at his post, he must be replaced with someone more capable.
Negotiate a mutual non-aggression pact with this faction, agreeing that you will not declare war on one another.
We will sign a non-aggression pact with {#recipientsfaction#}
We will sign a non-aggression pact with {#proposersfaction#}
We have a pact of non-aggression with {#recipientsfaction#}
We have a pact of non-aggression with {#proposersfaction#}
Negotiate a mutual military access agreement, allowing your forces to march across each other's lands.
